title: All-Star Special | Ep 73 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: All-Star Special | Ep 73 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
In a special episode of ALL THE SMOKE, Matt and Stak reflect on their All-Star game experiences, including going to it as players and as hosts of the show last year during a special weekend in Chicago. Plus, they breakdown this seasons rosters and breakdown the games format.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
